item.title: How Socio-Political Events Shape Consumption: Evidence from Music Streaming
item.description: This study explores how Brett Kavanaugh’s Supreme Court confirmation influenced music consumption in the U.S., revealing a notable increase in streams for female artists on Spotify during the politically charged period of September–November 2018.
